summary: This is a brief email exchange from August 2, 2007, where someone named Lilly reports that 'they will send their letter today' in response to an inquiry about Epstein. The email is forwarded from a BlackBerry device.

persons.name: Lilly
persons.context: Lilly is mentioned as having called the previous day to report that 'they will send their letter today' regarding an inquiry about Epstein.

events.title: Lilly's call about letter
events.description: Lilly called to inform the email recipient that 'they will send their letter today' regarding Epstein.

events.title: Email forwarding about Epstein inquiry
events.description: An email is forwarded discussing Lilly's call about sending a letter related to Epstein.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 2, 2007, during the period when Epstein was under investigation.
A person named Lilly reported that 'they will send their letter today' in response to an inquiry about Epstein.
The email suggests ongoing communication or coordination regarding Epstein matters at that time.
